page.title: 16SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: Unemployment is extremely high and increasing in North Braunstone.Many long term unemployed have inadequate basic skills.The population is relatively stable,although those upwardly mobile tend to migrate to other suburbs.It is difficult to find sufficient quantities of unskilled and semi-skilled industries of engineering and hosiery. Within the overall situation of the unemployed there are particularly disadvantaged groups i.e. women,single parents,young people and the disabled. Through the outreach work of the Community College staff complex networks are developed to help raise self-esteem,confidence,basic skills and training. Some developments have been playschemes,tatser courses,toy libraries and workers lunches.
